activities.title: Nova Scholar
activities.subtitle: Teacher and Mentor
activities.description: Currently teach middle school students the fundamentals of AI and machine learning, introducing them to core concepts and practical applications. Additionally mentor high school students through their first research paper, guiding them through the research process and methodology development.

activities.title: Pandemic Professors
activities.subtitle: Volunteer Teacher
activities.description: Taught middle school students coding fundamentals and guided them through building a complete game project together during the pandemic. Provided personalized 1-on-1 tutoring to help students develop problem-solving skills and confidence in computer science.

activities.title: Oakland Outreach
activities.subtitle: Co-Founder/Fundraising Chair
activities.description: Co-founded organization at the University of Pittsburgh to destigmatize mental illness, homelessness, and substance abuse through community work and volunteer events. Still active at University of Pittsburgh serving underrepresented communities.

activities.title: Underrepresented Minorities in Computing
activities.subtitle: Co-founder/Business Manager
activities.description: Co-founded UMC at the University of Pittsburgh to provide inclusive environment for underrepresented minorities in computing. Accelerated careers through education, community, and mentorship.
